results.title: The Manton plan
results.creator_credit: Tasmanian Film Corporation, Don Anderson and Sherry James
results.brief_description: Shows how a local municipality goes about establishing a “Disaster Plan”, and putting the plan into operation when a bus crashes on the outskirts of the town and all services are brought into action.

results.title: The Mansion [game trailer]
results.brief_description: It’s a moonless night… Let’s go explore a mansion. In ‘The Mansion’, a nameless character finds himself with the task of searching an old mansion. Although he can’t understand the lost children it doesn’t take a true connection to know only he can help. The story is told through a platformer format, inspired by games such as Super Mario Bros.

results.title: The Manhattan odyssey
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Francois Seguillon and Bernard Gosselin
results.brief_description: The epic voyage of the giant American oil tanker, the U.S.S. Manhattan, and the Canadian icebreaker, the John A. Macdonald, through the Northwest passage of the Canadian Arctic to test its navigability as a year-round commercial sea lane. Filmed from the ice, from a helicopter, and from aboard the two ships, this film captures the natural drama of the journey as the ships batter and buck their way through the heavy sea ice.

results.title: The Mango tree
results.creator_credit: Pisces Productions, Michael Pate and Kevin Dobson
results.brief_description: Jamie’s life is touched by all the experiences around him; he sees how a seemingly hopeless drunk can be a man of wisdom and an unforgettable friend; how a sadistic teacher can vent all his pent-up hatred on one unfortunate boy; how a “man of God”, trapped by his own sense of righteousness can turn brutally and commit murder; how people can join forces in times of utmost need, or turn against that which they don’t know or understand. Based on the novel by Ronald McKie. Stars Christopher Pate, Geraldine Fitzgerald, Robert Helpmann and Gerard Kennedy.

results.title: The Mandala garden
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Back yard permaculture”.
In less than four hours, permaculturist Robyn Francis transforms an area of vigorous lawn into a ready-to-plant, landscaped garden without the agonies of digging, turning the soil or removing the weeds. Vegetables, herbs and flowers are companion planted for ease of maintenance and harvest and in six weeks, the first delights of the garden are ready for picking. This gardening technique will suit any soil or climate.

results.title: The Manchurian Candidate
results.creator_credit: United Artists Corporation, M.C. Productions, Howard W. Koch and John Frankenheimer
results.brief_description: A brilliantly handled spy thriller! A Korean war ‘hero’ comes back a brainwashed zombie, triggered to kill a liberal politician… a human time bomb waiting to explode! Based on the novel by Richard Condon, this film stars Laurence Harvey and Angela Lansbury and Janet Leigh.

results.title: The management of work centres for the handicapped
results.creator_credit: United Motion Pictures, Heron Film Productions, Francis Haveron and Michael Holmes
results.brief_description: Describes the process of management through the management committee, the work centre manager and his staff. It shows work produced by physically handicapped workers which includes packing, assembling wire products, various machine operations and handicrafts.

results.title: The Man, the snake and the fox
results.brief_description: This film is a dramatization of a traditional Ojibwa legend; it is told to a group of children from the Wandereing Spirit Survival School. As the story unfolds, the characters played by puppets assume increasingly human characteristics. The moral of the fable: do not make promises that cannot be kept.
